name: Army Mission 3D
description:
Army Mission 3D!!!!
Become special force commando shooter, armed yourself with powerful weapons and take revenge from Russian forces before they occupy your land. It's time to get indulge in epic non-stop action game where you command your army to kill shot badass criminals.
Features
• 8 challenging military shooting missions to destroy enemy bases and infantry.
• Variety of weapons like rifle, bazooka and anti-aircraft guns.
• Destroy enemy helicopters & kill shot gunners in extreme shooting simulator.
• Make stealth moves to destroy rival army base camps and artillery in battle simulator.
• Just get ready, aim, fire in realistic army commando game.
• Extreme fighting adventure on enemy bases.
• Amazing jeep driving experience for advanced military shooting game.
